prompt: I'm going to describe a causal graphical directed acyclic model. There are three variables: <T1>, <T2> and <T3>. <T1> causes <T2>. <T2> causes <T3>.  These are all the causal relationships in the graph
question: In this causal graphical model, is there a path going from <T1> to <T3>?
label: yes
